django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.generation
=============================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.generation

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This module contains functions that generate ctypes prototypes for the
   GDAL routines.



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.generation.gdal_char_p


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.generation.bool_output
   django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.generation.double_output
   django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.generation.geom_output
   django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.generation.int_output
   django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.generation.int64_output
   django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.generation.srs_output
   django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.generation.const_string_output
   django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.generation.string_output
   django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.generation.void_output
   django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.generation.voidptr_output
   django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.generation.chararray_output


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: gdal_char_p

   Bases: :py:obj:`ctypes.c_char_p`


   XXX to be provided


.. py:function:: bool_output(func, argtypes, errcheck=None)

   Generate a ctypes function that returns a boolean value.


.. py:function:: double_output(func, argtypes, errcheck=False, strarg=False, cpl=False)

   Generate a ctypes function that returns a double value.


.. py:function:: geom_output(func, argtypes, offset=None)

   Generate a function that returns a Geometry either by reference
   or directly (if the return_geom keyword is set to True).


.. py:function:: int_output(func, argtypes, errcheck=None)

   Generate a ctypes function that returns an integer value.


.. py:function:: int64_output(func, argtypes)

   Generate a ctypes function that returns a 64-bit integer value.


.. py:function:: srs_output(func, argtypes)

   Generate a ctypes prototype for the given function with
   the given C arguments that returns a pointer to an OGR
   Spatial Reference System.


.. py:function:: const_string_output(func, argtypes, offset=None, decoding=None, cpl=False)

.. py:function:: string_output(func, argtypes, offset=-1, str_result=False, decoding=None)

   Generate a ctypes prototype for the given function with the
   given argument types that returns a string from a GDAL pointer.
   The `const` flag indicates whether the allocated pointer should
   be freed via the GDAL library routine VSIFree -- but only applies
   only when `str_result` is True.


.. py:function:: void_output(func, argtypes, errcheck=True, cpl=False)

   For functions that don't only return an error code that needs to
   be examined.


.. py:function:: voidptr_output(func, argtypes, errcheck=True)

   For functions that return c_void_p.


.. py:function:: chararray_output(func, argtypes, errcheck=True)

   For functions that return a c_char_p array.
